thiefworld.main
Class ThiefWorld

java.lang.Object
  sim.engine.SimState
      thiefworld.main.ThiefWorld
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ThiefWorld
extends sim.engine.SimState

The world class for the thief-world simulation. It contains the starting parameters of the simulation and the instances of the different agents created for the simulation.

Author:
Stefan Adrian Boronea
See Also:
